Header: New method to donate eyes, kidneys and livers
Content: Health Minister Rajitha Senarathna says that it is hoped to enable the insertion of a certificate claiming one’s willingness to donate parts of the body including eyes, kidneys and livers in one’s driving license. At a media conference held yesterday the Minister mentioned that organ transplantation takes place successful in many hospitals round the island and that it is foreseeable that this initiative will be of great service to the country.
